signup.agreeTerms: I agree to the Terms & Conditions

saveProductsHint: Tap the heart icon on products you like to save them here
forYouEmpty: Browse more products to get personalized recommendations!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Moondala does not sell your personal data. We make money from transactions and services â€” not from advertising that exploits user data.
section1Content: Account info: name, email, phone (if you add it), country, basic profile details.
App activity: actions like follows, likes, comments, messages, referrals (to prevent fraud).
Purchase & transaction info: orders, payments status, refunds/returns history.
Device & log data: IP address, browser/device type, app errors, security logs.
section2Content: To create and secure your account (login, fraud prevention, abuse detection).
To process orders, returns, refunds, and customer support.
To power core product features (feed, messaging, shop pages, referrals).
To improve reliability and performance (crash logs, bug fixing, analytics).
section3Content: We do not sell your personal data.
We do not allow third-party advertisers to target you using your private profile data.
privacyPolicy.section4Intro: We may share limited data only when needed to run the service, such as:
section4Content: Legal (if required by law, or to protect users and prevent fraud).
privacyPolicy.section5Content: We may use cookies/local storage for login sessions and basic analytics to improve the app. You can restrict cookies in your browser, but some features may not work.
section6Content: Request account deletion (removes or anonymizes data where possible).
Control privacy features (profile visibility, who can message you) if available in your Settings.
privacyPolicy.section7Content: We use reasonable security practices (encryption in transit, access controls, monitoring), but no system is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.section8Content: Add a support email when ready (example: support@moondala.one).

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: By using Moondala, you agree to follow these Terms. If you don't agree, don't use the app.
section1Content: You must provide accurate information and keep your account secure.
You're responsible for activity under your account.
We may suspend accounts involved in fraud, abuse, or rule violations.
section2Content: Scams, impersonation, fraud, or misleading referral behavior.
Harassment, hate, threats, or illegal content.
Trying to exploit bugs or reverse engineer the platform.
termsOfService.section3Intro: We have zero tolerance for fraud and abuse. You will be banned if you:
section3Content: Create duplicate or fake accounts to farm rewards or manipulate referrals.
Run 'referral farms' using bots, scripts, or automated account creation.
Sell, buy, trade, or share referral codes or accounts for profit.
Use Moondala to promote competitor referral schemes in a spammy way.
Steal Moondala content, code, branding, or impersonate Moondala.
Attempt to manipulate referral tracking, order systems, or reward calculations.
section4Content: Orders, returns, and refunds follow our Refund Policy.
Some items may be non-refundable if clearly labeled.
We may hold or reverse rewards when refunds/chargebacks happen.
termsOfService.section5Content: Rewards are governed by the Referral & Rewards Policy. We may pause or deny rewards for suspected abuse or fake accounts.
section6Content: You own your content, but you give Moondala permission to display it in the app.
Don't post content you don't have rights to.
termsOfService.section7Intro: We reserve the right to suspend or permanently ban accounts that:
section7Content: Violate these Terms, especially fraud and abuse provisions.
Engage in behavior that harms other users or the platform.
Are involved in repeated rule violations or ignore warnings.
termsOfService.section7Note: Banned users forfeit all pending rewards and may be blocked from creating new accounts.
termsOfService.section8Content: We may update features, fees, and policies as Moondala grows. We'll update the 'Last updated' date.
termsOfService.section9Content: Moondala is provided 'as is.' To the fullest extent permitted by law, we're not liable for indirect damages (lost profits, data loss, etc.).
termsOfService.section10Content: Support contact will be listed here (example: support@moondala.one).

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.intro: Moondala is social commerce â€” keep it safe, honest, and respectful.
allowedContent: Real product discussions, reviews, honest feedback.
Sharing referral codes in a truthful way (no deception).
notAllowedContent: Scams, fake giveaways, or misleading 'guaranteed earnings' claims.
Harassment, hate speech, threats, or bullying.
Illegal items/services or instructions for wrongdoing.
Spam (mass posting, repetitive links, bot behavior).
enforcementContent: We may remove content or restrict features.
Severe or repeated violations can lead to suspension or permanent ban.
communityGuidelines.reportingContent: If you see abuse, report it in the app (or support email when added).

refundPolicy.title: Return & Refund Policy
refundPolicy.intro: This policy describes the standard return/refund rules. Shops may have additional rules shown on the product page.
section1Content: Typical return window: 7â€“30 days (depends on the shop and product category).
Some items can be non-returnable (shown before purchase).
section2Content: Refunds go back to the original payment method when possible.
If you used Moondala credits/wallet, refunds may return to the wallet.
section3Content: Items must be returned in original condition unless damaged/defective.
Return shipping responsibility may depend on the reason (defect vs change of mind).
refundPolicy.section4Content: We may deny refunds for abuse, repeated suspicious behavior, or policy violations.
refundPolicy.section5Content: If an order is refunded, related referral rewards may be reversed.

referralPolicy.title: Referral & Rewards Policy
referralPolicy.intro: Referrals are meant for real people inviting real people. Fraud kills trust â€” we enforce this strictly.
section1Content: Rewards may be earned from eligible transactions in your referral chain.
Reward levels, percentages, and durations may be configurable by Moondala and can change over time.
Some transactions may be excluded (refunds, chargebacks, fraud, restricted items).
referralPolicy.section2Intro: You will be permanently banned if you:
section2Content: Create duplicate or fake accounts to farm rewards (including family/friend accounts used fraudulently).
Run "referral farms" using bots, scripts, or automated account creation tools.
Self-refer (using another account to refer yourself).
Buy, sell, trade, or share referral codes or accounts for money or benefits.
Use Moondala to spam-promote competitor referral schemes or MLM programs.
Manipulate referral tracking, order data, or reward calculations through technical exploits.
Impersonate Moondala or steal our content/code/branding.
Make misleading claims like "guaranteed income" or "risk-free profit".
referralPolicy.section2Detection: Detection: We use automated fraud detection, manual reviews, and pattern analysis. Suspicious activity triggers immediate investigation.
section3Content: We may hold rewards until an order is completed or a return window passes.
If a refund/chargeback happens, related rewards can be reversed.
We may pause payouts during fraud investigations.
section4Content: Immediate suspension: Account disabled pending investigation.
Permanent ban: Repeat offenders or severe fraud cases lose all access.
Reward forfeiture: All pending and earned rewards are cancelled and non-refundable.
Clawback: Already-paid rewards may be reclaimed if obtained fraudulently.
Legal action: We reserve the right to pursue legal remedies for fraud or theft.
Device/IP blocks: Banned users may be blocked from creating new accounts on the same device or network.
referralPolicy.section4Minor: For minor violations: Warnings, temporary feature restrictions, or reward holds.

onboarding.how_it_works_desc:
Big platforms profit from every order â€” you get nothing. Moondala changes that.

Instead of keeping the transaction fees, Moondala shares them with users through the referral tree.

Life is hard and expensive, so Moondala helps you turn your network into extra income.
